Autopsy Report Enquiry.name: Autopsy Report Enquiry
Autopsy Report Enquiry.subject: Additional Information Request for Autopsy Report
Autopsy Report Enquiry.body:
Dear <Primary Reporter>,

 

This is a request to provide more information about the case # <Intake Case #> related to the patient <Patient Initials> which was reported on <First Receipt Date>.

 

Kindly send the detailed autopsy report of the patient as provided from the hospital stating the cause(s) of death of the patient.

 

You can send the scanned copy of the report via email to pvintake@rxlogix.com or via fax to +1-609-910-1072

 

Yours Sincerely 

PV Intake Admin

 

Confidentiality Notice:  This e-mail message, together with any attachments, contains information of ABC Pharma Inc. (500 College Road East, Princeton, New Jersey, USA 08540).This information may be confidential, proprietary copyrighted and/or legally privileged.It is intended solely for the use of the individual or entity named on this message.If you are not the intended recipient, and have received this message in error, please notify us immediately by reply e-mail and then delete it from  your system.

Pregnancy Follow-Up.name: Pregnancy Follow-Up
Pregnancy Follow-Up.subject: Additional Information Request on Ongoing Pregnancy
Pregnancy Follow-Up.body:
Dear <Primary Reporter>,

 

This is a request to provide more information about the case # <Intake Case #> related to the patient <Patient Initials> which was reported on <First Receipt Date>.

 

Kindly send the latest ultrasound report and thyroid test report for third trimester of the patient.

 

You can send the scanned copy of the report via email to pvintake@rxlogix.com or via fax to +1-609-910-1072

 

Yours Sincerely 

PV Intake Admin

Product Questionnaire.name: Product Questionnaire
Product Questionnaire.subject: Additional Information Request on use of <Product Name>
Product Questionnaire.body:
Dear <Primary Reporter>,

 

This is a request to provide more information about the case # <Intake Case #> related to the patient <Patient Initials> which was reported on <First Receipt Date>.

 

Kindly fill-up the attached product questionnaire and send it to us for analysis.

 

You can send the scanned copy of the report via email to pvintake@rxlogix.com or via fax to +1-609-910-1072

 

Yours Sincerely 

PV Intake Admin
